name: Madolche Queen Tiara-a-la-Fraise
text:
3 Level 5 "Madolche" monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Madolche Queen Tiara-a-la-Fraise" by using "Madolche Queen Tiaramisu" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Once per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target up to 2 "Madolche" cards in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, and if you do, shuffle up to that many cards your opponent controls into the Deck. If this card in your possession is destroyed by your opponent and sent to your GY: Return it to the Extra Deck.
